To estimate the time taken for a cycle trip from Derby to Belper in the UK,
we can use the `route*` functions:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
from <- "Derby"
to <- "Belper"
rf <- route_cyclestreet(from, to)
rf@data
rf$time / 60 # estimate the time in minutes
qleafmap(rf)
```

```{r, eval=FALSE}
from <- "Sheffield"
rf <- route_cyclestreet(from, to)
rf@data
rf$time / 60 # estimate the time in minutes
qleafmap(rf)
```
